com.qtplaf.library.ai.learning.propagation

Class Propagation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.ai.learning.LearningMethod
      • com.qtplaf.library.ai.learning.propagation.Propagation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackPropagation, ResilientPropagation

    public abstract class Propagation
extends LearningMethod
    Root back propagation algorithms.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getWeightChange

        protected abstract double getWeightChange(int layer,
                                          double[][] gradients,
                                          int out,
                                          int in)
        Ask extenders (back and resilient propagation) to return the weight change to apply. It is also responsibility of the extender to update last gradients and weight changes, because it is the extender that defines their use.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer.
        gradients - The gradients of the layer.
        out - The output neuron of the weights matrix.
        in - The input neuron of the weights matrix.
        Returns:
        The weight update to apply.

      • updateWeights

        protected void updateWeights(java.util.List<double[][]> gradients)
        Update the weights of the network, applying the weight update of the extender. It is the resposibility of the extender to update last gradients and weight changes, because it is the extender that defines their use.

      • updateGradients

        private void updateGradients()
        Update gradients from tasks and set task gradients to zero.

      • performIteration

        Perform one training iteration.
